content: have created next week's agenda https://hackmd.io/LydTi9iiR-S1EMUVtIBZxg?both, which we would be updating along the week :)

@Santiago Pastorino I have started updating this week's agenda earlier, trying to process some issues and add a bit of context, in the spirit of what I think you suggest in this pr.
Let me know if I'm getting closer to what you mean there. Personally I'd like summaries to be be clear but not too verbose.

Also, if there is any feedback from the actual people reading the agenda :-) that would be great to understand where/if it needs to improve
right, clear and not too verbose would be the goal
tomorrow will take a look at the agenda and finish polishing it
btw, unsure what are we going to do with forge#452
